{{< image-gallery gallery_dir="/images/1950_12_01_elettrocarbonium_1950_51" >}}


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)

# Dati IMDb
imdb <- read_csv(here("static/data/programmazione_imdb.csv")) %>% 
  select(const = Const, url = URL)

# Dati fonte
proiezioni_fonte <- read_csv(here("static/data/programmazione_agende.csv")) %>%
  select(const, date, title, source) %>%
  filter(str_detect(source, "Elettrocarbonium 1950-51")) %>%
  left_join(imdb, by = "const") %>%
  mutate(title = paste0("[", title, "](", url, ")"))
```


## 1950
### Dicembre

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
proiezioni_fonte %>% 
  filter(lubridate::year(date) == 1950, lubridate::month(date) == 12) %>% 
  select(date, title) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  kable(col.names = c("", ""))
```
